description:
A dead simple Wii backup manager.


What's Changed
- âš¡ï¸ Reduce memory usage when downloading banners by @mq1 in #332
- â™»ï¸ Clean up codebase, improve maintainability by @mq1 in #335
- â™»ï¸ Simpler (and more lightweight) split file reading implementation by @mq1 in #336
- â™»ï¸ Add a proper OverflowWriter class for split writing by @mq1 in #337
- ðŸ› Split file related bug fixing by @mq1 in #338
- âš¡ï¸ Slightly improve split writing performance by @mq1 in #339
Full Changelog: 4.3.6...4.3.7
